title: Relaxed Waterfront Komodo Stay with Mountain Views
description: Adventure awaits with an exciting stay amid incredible mountains overlooking the stunning Flores Sea. Just an hour from Bali, this stunning retreat offers unparalleled access to the ocean's vibrant marine life with snorkelling explorations, unmissable sunsets from the heights of Bukit Sylvia, and rich history to be discovered in the Goa Batu Cermin caves. Savour the local flavours of Takjil and Iftar dishes at the hotel's ocean-view restaurant, Ramadhan Iftar, dive into the crystal-clear waters of the infinity pool, or enjoy fishing from one of the many nearby piers.
offer_address: Kawasan Marina, Jl. Soekarno Hatta, Labuan Bajo, Kec. Komodo, Kabupaten Manggarai Barat, 86711, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonedia
